author: Addie Joseph
title: Why you should rewatch your favorite TV shows right now, according to a clinical social worker
description: Amid the fears and stress brought on by the coronavirus pandemic, clinical social worker Dr. Maria Baratta offers suggestions for the kinds of shows and movies you should be seeing right now. Her recommendation: Watch something you've already seen before.
content: While people stay at home and adhere to social distancing guidelines, many are starting to seek out new shows and movies to help kill time and keep their minds off coronavirus pandemic worries. But the best thing to watch might just be your old favorites, say… [+1861 chars]
